text:
# 2025 GENERAL SPORTS OFFER PRODUCT FACT FILE ![img-0.jpeg](img-0.jpeg) ![img-1.jpeg](img-1.jpeg) # 2025 SPORTS FEED SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS FEED SERVICE ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - A real-time sports news feed - Production available in 6 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic and Portuguese - Hourly coverage: 24/7, in real time - Non-regionalised feed | Description | Sports coverage | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more… | | Sports extras | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more… | ## *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-2.jpeg](img-2.jpeg) | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | | Monthly subscription | Via satellite or FTP for direct integration into the customer's system API AFP News | | New | *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events | # 2025 ## SID SPORTS TEXT SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SID SPORTS TEXT Service ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Aimed at a German-speaking media, corporate and institutional clientele living mainly in Germany or in Europe and looking for rich coverage of sports news. - German correspondents present in Paris, Brussels, Washington, Istanbul. - Hourly coverage: 24/7 in real time. ## COVERAGE - Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, etc. - Sporting information managed by the SID office based in Cologne, aimed primarily at a German-speaking clientele looking for German sports news in real time. - Focus on German sports and the performance of German athletes. - The feed also covers other sports as well as the main national and special events ![img-3.jpeg](img-3.jpeg) ## COVERAGE DETAIL** - Athletics - Basketball - Cyclism - Handball - Motor sports - Ski - Football - Tennis - Olympics ## PRODUCT FORMATS - Delivery of metadata: XML, NewsML and jpg, if the story includes photos. ## SUBSCRIPTION - Monthly subscription to the complete feed or to a selection within the feed ## DELIVERY METHODS - FTP or satellite - AFP - Forum - SIDForum - API *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events # 2025 ## SPORTING INFORMATION FEED IN ARABIC (ARB SPORT) PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTING INFORMATION FEED IN ARABIC ## "ARB SPORT" EDITION ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Aimed at Arabic-speaking customers interested in world and regional sports news. - Validated by the Nicosia desk. - AFP has Arabic-speaking sports editors writing in Arabic, present in all countries of the region. - Hourly coverage: 6am to 10pm GMT, 7 days a week, in real time. ### COVERAGE - Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, motor racing sports, etc. - The feed also covers other sports as well as the main special, national and international (football World Cup, etc.) events. | Forecasts | Time (GMT) | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | "Sports forecast menu" | 11:30am | Forecasts on ARB Sport service themes: football, athletics, tennis, basketball. | ### Coverage details** ![img-4.jpeg](img-4.jpeg) | PRODUCT FORMATS | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | NewsML-G2, IIM, NewsML-1.1, ANPA | Monthly subscription to the full service or to the section. | API Satellite or FTP AFP News | **Average volume from January to December 2024* **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events* # 2025 SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Pictures captioned in English and classified according to IPTC norms. - The number of pictures can reach 1,200 per day during weekends or for major special events. - Coverage: 24/7, in real-time ## Sports coverage Sports events Sports extras ## Description Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more... Sporting Institutions (IOC, FIFA, federations, clubs, athletes, sponsors). Other themes relating to sport such as doping, justice, people, etc. ## Coverage details** ![img-5.jpeg](img-5.jpeg) PRODUCT FORMATS - Image size via satellite: 1.5 MB - Image size via FTP: - 1.5 MB - Formats via AFP Forum: 512 pixels, 768 pixels or original size - 800 KB for Africa SUBSCRIPTION - One-shot sales - Quota, with or without over quota - Photo feed (annual subscription) ## DELIVERY METHODS - Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP - API - AFP News # 2025 INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SPORTS ## PRODUCT FACT FILE ![img-6.jpeg](img-6.jpeg) # SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SERVICE ## SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Graphics combining information, images and data - Production available in 6 languages: French, English, Arabic, Spanish, German and Portuguese | Sports coverage | Description | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Systematic coverage of major Sports events: football World cup and Champions’ League, Olympic Summer and Winter Games, Tour de France, Formula One presentation On merit coverage of major sports development: record breaking, sport legends career summary… | | Sports extras | Explainer on new technologies and innovations in sports, on doping issues… | ### *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-7.jpeg](img-7.jpeg) | PRODUCT FORMATS | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | .AI .PNG (standard or retina) .JPEG (standard or retina) .PDF EPS .JPEG | One-shot sales Quota, with or without over-quota Infographics feed (annual subscription) Also available via Online News via FTP for direct integration | Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP API AFP News | **Average volume from January to December 2024* **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events like Olympics* # SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SERVICE ## SPORTS VIDEOGRAPHICS ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Videographics combine text, images, video and 3D modelling elements with audio voice-over and a separate dopesheet - Formats dedicated to digital and audiovisual media: TV, online editors, mobiles, tablets, public screens… Available in 6 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, and Portuguese - Separate audio voice-over and script - Ready to publish format or editable format for translation and integration into your story. | Sports coverage | Description | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Systematic coverage of special events: Winter and Summer Olympic Games, FIFA World Cup | | Sports extras | Focus on new technologies and innovations in sports, including in Formula 1 | ### *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-8.jpeg](img-8.jpeg) ## PRODUCT FORMATS - JPEG - Adobe Flash [16:9] 640x360 (.f4v) - MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 1280x720 (.mp4) - MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 640x360 (.mp4) - MPEG2 [4:3] 720x576 (.mp2) - One-shot sales - Quota, with or without over-quota - Videographics feed (annual subscription) - Also available via Online News via FTP for direct integration ## DELIVERY METHODS - Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP - API - AFP News **Average volume from January to December 2024** **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events like Olympics** # 2025 SPORTS DATA FEED PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS DATA FEED ## EDITORIAL FORMAT ## The largest catalogue of sports data More than 2,000 streams of sporting results covered per year Sporting data and performance statistics on the main matches and all competitions in real time Reliable, accurate and timely feeds, suitable for all types of media Available in 18 languages including French, English, German, Spanish, Italian, Chinese and Portuguese Other languages available | Sports coverage | Description | | :-- | :-- | | Football | Domestic leagues, international cups, European
competitions | | Formula 1 | World championship | | Cycling | World championship | | Rugby | World Cup, Top 14, Pro D2, Champions Cup, 6 Nations | | Basketball | NBA, Euroleague, Europe Cup, EuroCup, World Cup | | Olympic Games | Summer and Winter Games | | Tennis | ATP / WTA, Billie Jean King Cup and Davis Cup | | Athletics | World Athletics meetings, World Championships, Diamond
League | | Volleyball | Women's and Men's European Volleyball Championships | PRODUCT FORMATS SUBSCRIPTION DELIVERY METHODS XML JSON One or several competitions / sports. One-off events (one-shot) Widgets Via API, for optimal integration Database-to-database replication # 2025 AFPTV SPORTS FR \& EN PRODUCT FACT FILE # AFPTV SPORTS IN FRENCH ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Raw images with or without sound. - Fully edited video reports - Video length: from 30 seconds to 4 minutes / profiles and features : up to 10 minutes - Intended for broadcasters, production companies and other media - Product to be edited by the client ## COVERAGE - News and big competitions - Press conferences, training sessions, fan reactions, business, etc. - European football championships (Ligue 1, Liga, EPL), Champions League, Europa League (final) - Special events: Football World Cup, Olympic and Paralympic Games... - Red Bull Media House provides editorial content on a wide range of sporting disciplines from racing to esports and extreme sports in various locations around the world: 250 photos and 15 videos per month - Original reports and illustrative images | SLUG | Product | Edited sequences | Voice-over | Sound bite dubbing | Extra rushes | Script | Editable sequences | Sepxounds
rack | | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | | IMAGES | Raw footage with ambient sound, no sound or voice-over | | | | | | | | | | Raw images with sound
(statements, speeches, interviews, etc.) | ⊙ | ⊙ | ⊙ | ⊙ | | | | ## Coverage
24 hours a day
7 days a week +380^∘ editable videos per month ## 130
production points worldwide ## PRODUCT FORMATS Delivery of metadata: XML Video formats: MPEG4 H. 264 [16:9]; 1920x1080 (.mp4); MPEG4 H. 264 [16:9] 1280x720 (.mp4) ; MPEG4 H. 264 [16:9] 640x360 (.mp4); MPEG2 [16:9 - PAL] 720x576 (.mpg or .mp2) ## SUBSCRIPTION Feed Package Per item ## DELIVERY METHODS - Satellite - FTP - API - AFP Forum \& AFP News # AFPTV SPORTS IN FRENCH ## COVERAGE | | AFPTV
Sports | 510 | Highlights | | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | | International competitions | | | | | Summer \& Winter Olympic Games - football World Cup | x | x | x | | Tour de France and La Vuelta | x | | x | | Continental competitions | | | | | Champions League: training and press conferences from main matches in the first phases, all matches in the final phase - UEFA Euro - Copa America | x | | | | Regional competitions | | | | | Bundesliga | | x | | | All sports: football, tennis, cricket, athletics, motorsports, swimming, cycling (see all the competitions in the ASO calendar), golf, basketball, handball, rugby, skiing, figure skating, boxing, gymnastics, baseball. | x | | | | Institutions: Sports Institution news (IOC, FIFA, federations, clubs, athletes, sponsors). Press conferences, interviews, voxpops, business, economy, conferences, doping. | x | | | # AFPTV SPORTS IN FRENCH ## ATOC PRODUCT CODES | Product code | Subscription method | Product name | Average production volume | Delivery | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | M16112 | Feed | Media.Fil.Video.AFPTV Sport.en français | | Satellite Europe and MENA (HD) FTP API AFP Forum + AFP News | | M16114 | Package | Media.Forfait.Video.AFPTV Sport.en français | 10 * / day | | | | | | | AFP Forum | | M16116 | Per item | Media.A La Pièce.Video.AFPTV Sport.en français | | | *Average volume from January to December 2024 # AFPTV SPORTS IN ENGLISH ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Raw images with or without sound - Fully edited video reports - Video length: from 30 seconds to 4 minutes / profiles and features: up to 10 minutes - Intended for broadcasters, production companies and other media - Product to be edited by the client ## COVERAGE - News and big competitions - Press conferences, training sessions, fan reactions, business, etc. - European football championships (Ligue 1, Liga, Premier League, Bundesliga, Serie A), Champions League, Europa League (final) - Special events: Football World Cup, Olympic and Paralympic Games... - Red Bull Media House provides editorial content on a wide range of sporting disciplines from racing to esports and extreme sports in various locations around the world: 250 photos and 15 videos per month - Original reports and illustrative images | SLUG | Product | Edited sequences | Voice-over | Sound bite dubbing | Extra rushes | Script | Editable sequences | Sepsoundt rack | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | RAW | Raw footage with ambient sound, with or without sound, no voice-over | ☑ | | | | ☑ | | | | | | | ☑ | ☑ | | | ✓ | ✓ | | NSV | Fully edited, with no voice-over and dubbing | ✓ | | | | ✓ | | | | | Coverage 24 hours a day 7 days a week | | + 300* editable videos per month | | | | 130 video production points worldwide | | | PRODUCT FORMATS | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | Delivery of metadata: XML | Feed | Satellite | | Video formats: | Package | FTP | | MPEG4 H.264 [16:9]; 1920x1080 (.mp4); | | API | | MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 1280x720 (.mp4); | | AFP Forum & AFP NEWS | | MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 640x360 (.mp4); | | | | MPEG2 [16:9 - PAL] 720x576 (.mpg or .mp2) | | | ![img-9.jpeg](img-9.jpeg) **Average volume from January to December 2024* # AFPTV SPORTS IN ENGLISH ## COVERAGE | | AFPTV
Sports | SID | Highlights | | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | | International competitions | | | | | Winter Olympic Games 2022 - football World Cup 2022 | x | x | x | | Tour de France and La Vuelta 2022 | x | | x | | Continental competitions | | | | | Champions League: training and press conferences from main matches in the first phases, all matches in the final phase - UEFA Euro - Copa America | x | | | | Regional competitions | | | | | Bundesliga | | x | | | All sports: football, tennis, cricket, athletics, motorsports, swimming, cycling (see all the competitions in the ASO calendar), golf, basketball, handball, rugby, skiing, figure skating, boxing, gymnastics, baseball. | x | | | | Institutions: Sports Institution news (IOC, FIFA, federations, clubs, athletes, sponsors). Press conferences, interviews, voxpops, business, economy, conferences, doping. | x | | | # AFPTV SPORTS IN ENGLISH ## ATOC PRODUCT CODE | Product code | Subscription method | Product name | Average production volume | Delivery | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | M16113 | Feed | Media.Wire.Video.AFPTV Sports.in English | | Satellite Europe and MENA (HD) FTP API AFP Forum + AFP News | | M16115 | Package | Media.Forfait.Video.AFPTV Sports.in English | 10 * / day | | | M16117 | Per item | Media.A La Pièce.Video.AFPTV Sports.in English | | AFP Forum \& AFP News | # AFPTV SPORTS ## ASO EVENT CALENDAR 2025 | ASO CALENDAR 2025 | | | --- | --- | | **CYCLING** | | | 9-16 MARCH | PARIS-NICE | | APRIL 13 | PARIS-ROUBAIX | | APRIL 23 | FLÈCHE WALLONNE | | APRIL 27 | LIÈGE-BASTOGNE-LIÈGE | | JUNE 8-15 | CRITÉRIUM DU DAUPHINÉ | | JULY 5-27 | TOUR DE FRANCE | | AUGUST 23-SEPTEMBER 14 | VUELTA | | OCTOBER 12 | PARIS-TOURS | | **MOTOR SPORTS** | | | JANUARY 3-17 | DAKAR | | **RUNNING** | | | APRIL 13 | PARIS MARATHON | | **MOUNTAIN BIKING** | | | OCTOBER 8 | ROC D'AZUR | | **FOOTBALL** | | | TBD | BALLON D'OR | # 2025 AFP SPORTS STORIES PRODUCT FACT FILE # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## DESCRIPTION - Multimedia reports consisting of text, photos, infographics, video and contextualised video; ready-to-use articles ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Automatic integration of articles into the client's site: - Integration of articles in real time in chronological order for easy and complete online access - Customised content integration to suit the client's content and upload preferences - Multiple editorial and technical formats for optimised adaptation to all digital media: web and mobile sites, public screens and any other interactive information medium and connected TV. ## ADDED VALUE - Productivity gains for media departments for non-core topics, thanks to instant publication of content and continuous feed to web and mobile sites - Sections adapted to suit each production language - Unique metadata to index and reference each news story ## AVAILABLE I ANGUAGES - Service available in 9 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic, Portuguese, simplified and traditional Chinese. 108 *Articles illustrated per day (all languages) | Languages | Number of sections | | --- | --- | | French | 3 | | English | 5 | | Spanish | 6 | | German | 19 | | Portuguese | 2 | | Arabic | 1 | | Chinese | 1 | ## PRODUCT FORMATS - Text: NewsML 1.2, XML, HTML, NewsML G2 formats - Photos: rectangular formats 768px, 245px, 110px square formats 220px, 170px, 120px - Videos: Mpeg4 H.264, Flash, MP2 PAL ## SUBSCRIPTION - To the section - Feed ## DELIVERY METHODS - FTP - API - AFP Forum # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## IN FRENCH ### COVERAGE - 3 thematic sections providing comprehensive coverage of international news. ![img-10.jpeg](img-10.jpeg) ### SECTIONS | AFP Stories Sections in French | Topic Daily average | Updated Daily average | Illustrations per article (photos & infographics) Daily average | Number of articles with video Daily average | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Football* | 4 | 10 | 1 | 1 | | Sports* | 13 | 19 | 2 | 1 | | Olympic Games* | 1 | 1 | 2 | 1 | | Total (average)* | 18 | 30 | | | ### Type of reports Magazine Post-match analysis Factual Presentations ### Detail of coverage in the "sports"** section - Basketball - Motor sports - Rugby - Football - Tennis - Olympics - Cyclism ![img-11.jpeg](img-11.jpeg) *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## IN ENGLISH ### COVERAGE - title: 2025 GENERAL SPORTS OFFER PRODUCT FACT FILE

altTexts.name: img-0.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image features a rhythmic gymnast in mid-performance, showcasing a dynamic pose. The gymnast is wearing a sparkling, intricately designed costume that is predominantly pink and adorned with sequins and embellishments. The outfit has a fitted bodice and a flared skirt, enhancing the elegance of the movement. 

Instead of a head, there is a large, shiny pink ball positioned where the head would typically be, creating a surreal and whimsical effect. The gymnast's arms are gracefully extended, and one leg is lifted, emphasizing the fluidity and artistry of the routine. The background is a soft, neutral color, which helps to highlight the vibrant costume and the gymnast's athletic form.

altTexts.name: img-1.jpeg
altTexts.text: The image features a textual layout with a black background at the top displaying the year "2025" in large, bold, white font. Below that, in a slightly smaller font, the words "GENERAL S" are presented, also in white. The bottom section of the image has a light blue background with the text "PRODUCT FACT FIL" in bold, black letters, suggesting it may be part of a product information document or label. The overall design is clean and modern, emphasizing clarity and readability.

altTexts.name: img-2.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image presents a pie chart illustrating the distribution of stories published per day, totaling 292 stories (excluding updates). The chart is divided into segments, each representing a different language:

- **Arabic**: 35% (largest segment, colored blue)
- **English**: 20% (colored orange)
- **Spanish**: 16% (colored purple)
- **French**: 14% (colored pink)
- **German**: 10% (colored light blue)
- **Portuguese**: 5% (smallest segment, colored yellow)

The chart visually emphasizes the proportion of stories in each language, with Arabic having the highest share. The title and the percentage labels are clearly displayed, providing a straightforward overview of the data.

altTexts.name: img-3.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image is a pie chart that visually represents the distribution of various sports. The largest segment, colored blue, occupies 57% of the chart and is labeled as "Football." 

Other segments include:

- "Athletics" (light blue) at 2%
- "Basketball" (black) at 7%
- "Cycling" (gray) at 3%
- "Handball" (yellow) at 6%
- "Motor sports" (purple) at 6%
- "Ski" (light purple) at 6%
- "Tennis" (green) at 6%
- "Olympics" (orange) at 8%

Each segment is accompanied by its respective percentage, indicating the proportion of interest or participation in each sport. The chart uses a variety of colors to differentiate between the sports clearly.

altTexts.name: img-4.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image presents a pie chart alongside a textual description. The chart illustrates the distribution of reports per day (excluding updates) across various sports, totaling over 30 reports. 

- The largest segment, colored blue, represents Football, accounting for 67% of the reports.
- The next largest segment is in orange, indicating Motor sports at 9%.
- Following that, there are smaller segments for Basketball (8%), Athletics (7%), and Tennis (7%).
- The smallest segment, colored purple, represents the Olympics, contributing 2% to the total.

The chart effectively visualizes the dominance of Football in the reporting landscape, while also highlighting the presence of other sports.

altTexts.name: img-5.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image presents a visual representation of the distribution of photos taken per day across various sports. At the top left, it states "1,490 photos per day" in bold, emphasizing the total number of photos captured. 

To the right, a pie chart illustrates the percentage breakdown of these photos by sport. The segments are color-coded and labeled as follows:

- **Football** (blue) accounts for the largest portion at 39%.
- **Basketball** (black) follows with 22%.
- **Motor sports** (purple) makes up 11%.
- **Cycling** (pink) represents 9%.
- **Athletics** (orange) is at 7%.
- **Tennis** (light blue) and **Rugby** (green) each contribute 3%.
- **Cricket** (red) also holds 4%.
- The **Olympics** (cyan) is represented by a small segment at 2%.

Overall, the chart provides a clear visual summary of the prevalence of different sports in daily photography.

altTexts.name: img-6.jpeg
altTexts.text: The image features a simple logo on a bright yellow background. The text "AFP" is displayed in bold blue letters, followed by a blue circle, and then the word "Sports" in black letters. The overall design is clean and modern, emphasizing the "AFP" branding prominently.

altTexts.name: img-7.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image features a pie chart that illustrates the distribution of infographics created per day in different languages. The chart is divided into five segments, each representing a language:

- **German**: 24% (yellow segment)
- **English**: 24% (purple segment)
- **Spanish**: 21% (light blue segment)
- **French**: 16% (orange segment)
- **Portuguese**: 15% (blue segment)

To the left of the pie chart, there is a statement indicating that an average of 6 infographics are produced each day. The percentages in the segments reflect the proportion of infographics attributed to each language.

altTexts.name: img-8.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image presents a pie chart illustrating the distribution of videographics produced per year, totaling 75. The chart is divided into five segments, each representing a different language:

- **German**: This segment is colored light blue and accounts for 4% of the total.
- **English**: Represented in orange, this segment makes up 27%.
- **Spanish**: Shown in blue, this portion comprises 28%.
- **French**: This segment is colored yellow and represents 16%.
- **Portuguese**: Illustrated in red, this segment accounts for 25%.

The overall message emphasizes the annual production of 75 videographics, with the pie chart visually breaking down the contributions by language.

altTexts.name: img-9.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image features a clean, minimalist design with three sections, each set against a black background. 

1. The first section highlights "Coverage" with the text "24 hours a day" and "7 days a week," emphasizing continuous availability.
2. The second section states "+ 300* editable videos per month," indicating a high volume of video content that can be customized.
3. The third section mentions "130 video production points worldwide," suggesting a global reach and extensive network for video production.

The text is presented in a bold, white font, making it easily readable against the dark background.

altTexts.name: img-10.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image features a clean and modern design with a black background. It presents three key points, each highlighted in white text. 

1. The first section emphasizes "Coverage" with the details "24 hours a day" and "7 days a week," indicating continuous availability.
2. The second section states "3 Thematic sections," suggesting a structured approach to content organization.
3. The final section notes "+15* articles illustrated per day," implying a high volume of visual content produced daily.

Overall, the layout is straightforward, focusing on clarity and easy readability.

altTexts.name: img-11.jpeg
altTexts.text:
The image features a pie chart divided into eight segments, each representing a different percentage. The segments are colored in various shades: 

- The largest segment, colored light blue, occupies 32% of the chart.
- Next is a yellow segment at 17%.
- A red segment follows at 14%.
- The blue segment represents 12%.
